title: Glenn's story
creator_credit: Arnold Zable, Sue Dunstan and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A documentary based on a story written by a 15 year old boy in the maximum security section of Turana. Discusses his childhood and the events which eventually lead to his becoming a ward of the state and finding himself on the wrong side of the law.
creator_credit_for_label: Arnold Zable, Sue Dunstan and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
